thread.section_title: AirFreight.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AirFreight.com | airfreight.com
thread.title: David Goodfellow

author: David Goodfellow
title: David Goodfellow
text: I have a customer who needed a piece of freight 1400 miles away a.s.a.p. I have never used this company but thought I'd try and see what they might be able to do. I spoke with Kevin Carpenter who put together a fast Quote: for me. The delivery time was excellent and he explained how we could get the freight there quickly and at a very good price. I took him up on his service promise and he lived up to it. He was in constant communication with updates on progress, road conditions and expected delivery times. The freight was delivered as promised. I would not hesitate to use them again and will recommend them to people I know. Thank you for delivering what you promised!
